description: New York City delivery workers who ride e-bikes for food delivery apps protested against wage theft, lack of protections, and poor working conditions, including rampant theft of their e-bikes and violent assault while on the job. The protest was organized by Los Deliveristas Unidos, a grassroots campaign formed by immigrant Latinx delivery workers in New York City in 2020 during the pandemic.
